page.title: 03Water activities in Hamble
page.content: There are many water activities in this area.The main centre is Hamble. The different boats are yachts and cruisers.Many of the boats are made in Hamble.{Sailing}is very popular in Hamble.There is enough room for over three thousand boats in the marina . When people go{water skiing}they get the boats from Hamble marina.When people go{wind surfing}they do it further up the Hamble. { The Hamble and Warsash ferry}runs across the River Hamble and back again.The person who takes the ferry over is called{Mr Sedgewick. The Inshore Rescue is really a part of the{Hampshire Coastguard}.Once the Lifeboat men had to be rescued themselves because their boat started to sink.
